name: search_all_words_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool complete_study_bible.
Tool description: The most COMPLETE Bible study API available! Strongs, Locations, Dictionaries, and more! 
API description: Returns KJV verses containing all of the supplied words, in any order. Words are separated by '%20' i.e., spaces. Words are not case-sensitive.

words.description: Words to search for in the KJV Bible verses, separated by '%20' (URL encoded spaces).
